title: This Website
description: I wanted to create a place to house all of the things that I've created and written, so I used my Angular knowledge gained from a summer internship to create this site.

title: AuthorTools
description: A python package available on PyPI, containing a bunch of useful functions for writers.

title: Tarot Card Reader
description: A simple web application where you can draw tarot cards in several spreads.  Card descriptions included.

title: Missile Defender
description: A game made in Unity where you defend against missiles.  Based on the classic Missile Command.

title: Bit Engine
description: A simple physics simulation with bits.  I made this in high school (must download on Gamejolt to play)
